short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Select a SAP Customer Incident number from a web page, right click, and open the incident directly in the web browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- Open a SAP customer incident from right-click's context menu.

*** Version 1.16.11
- Fixed bugs when creating dynamic menu item

*** Version 1.16.10
Added dynamic context menu behavior
- If the selected is "AB 123 CD 45", the detected incident number will be "12345".
- If the selected is "AB CD EF", the context menu will not be displayed (since an incident number is numeric and thus does not contain characters).

*** Version 1.16.9
- Initial version
